speakers.name: Enid Tian
speakers.bio:
Enid is the Head of AppWorks School, where she helps young people acquire the necessary programming skills as well as computational thinking mindset to start a career in Internet Companies. 

She joined AppWorks as an intern in 2011 and stayed on as Analyst after graduation. Enid received her B.A. in Finance from National Taiwan University, with â€œminorsâ€ in AIESEC and Ballroom Dancing Club.
